Message: I served many lords since then,

for I knew I had to keep
pushing forward.

I even deliberately
took on as many dangerous
missions as I could.

However, death came knocking
at the doors of every lord I served.

I eventually became known as
the “Harbinger of Death.”
I thought the name suited me.

After all...I let each and
every one of my lords die.

My ambition was
to be a proud knight,

but continuing on
this path would just lead
to more people suffering.

If that is my fate, I will
cast my knighthood away,
and live a life of solitude...

The moment I made that
decision, a young child
paid me a visit.

She said to me,
“Would you do me the honor
of serving as my knight?”
